entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then rain changing to snow mixed with rain near midnight and then changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
